title: Fix emoji alignment in profile creation mobile view

requirements.text: Fix emoji alignment in the profile creation page so that emojis are properly centered within their selection boxes in mobile view

quotes: in the mobile view, when creating a profile, the emojis are not centered in there box. this is causing the app to look a little buggy can you fix this?

acceptanceCriteria: Emojis in the profile setup emoji selection grid are visually centered both horizontally and vertically within their boxes on mobile devices
The emoji grid maintains consistent spacing and alignment across all emoji options
No visual bugs or misalignment issues appear in the profile creation view on mobile screen sizes

constraints: Do not modify the emoji options array in frontend/src/constants/profileOptions.ts
Preserve the existing ProfileSetup page layout and functionality
nonGoals: Changes to emoji selection on desktop view
Modifications to color or background selection UI
